org.activity.controller

Class ControllerWithoutServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.activity.controller.ControllerWithoutServer

  • public class ControllerWithoutServer
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used for recommending without the web interface (no web server) Note: to run these experiments proper parameters must be set in class org.activity.util.Constant and this class
    Author:
    gunjan

      static java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.sql.Date,Timeline>> reduceAndCleanTimelines(java.lang.String databaseName, java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.sql.Date,Timeline>> usersDayTimelinesOriginal, boolean writeToFile)
      For Gowalla data:
        removes days with less than 10 acts per day removes users with less than 50 days For all data, removes day timelines:
          with no valid activity, with <=1 distinct valid activity, and the weekend day timelines. For Gowalla data:
            again removes users with less than 50 days (this is after cleaning)

      removed days with less than 10 acts per day

      • reduceAndCleanTimelines

        public static java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.sql.Date,Timeline>> reduceAndCleanTimelines(java.lang.String databaseName,
                                                                                                                                java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.sql.Date,Timeline>> usersDayTimelinesOriginal,
                                                                                                                                boolean writeToFile)
        For Gowalla data:
        1. removes days with less than 10 acts per day
        2. removes users with less than 50 days
        For all data, removes day timelines:
        1. with no valid activity,
        2. with <=1 distinct valid activity, and
        3. the weekend day timelines.
        For Gowalla data:
        1. again removes users with less than 50 days (this is after cleaning)
        Parameters:
        databaseName -
        usersDayTimelinesOriginal -
        writeToFile -
        Returns:

      • reduceGowallaTimelines

        public static java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.sql.Date,Timeline>> reduceGowallaTimelines(java.lang.String databaseName,
                                                                                                                               java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.sql.Date,Timeline>> usersDayTimelinesOriginal,
                                                                                                                               boolean writeToFile)
        removed days with less than 10 acts per day

        removed users with less than 50 days

        Parameters:

        usersDayTimelinesOriginal -
        writeToFile -
